# Trading, decentralized

## dYdX is the leading DeFi protocol developer for advanced trading. Trade
**cryptocurrencies** with **low fees** , **deep liquidity** , and **up to
20×** Buying Power.

Trade now

v4

Trade now

v3

Get **dYdX** for iPhoneAndroid coming soon.dYdX does not operate, run or
deploy any infrastructure on dYdX Chain. Learn more →

Trading, the way it should be

The best of DeFi meets a professional trading experience

Self custody

    You, and only you, keep custody of your funds while trading

Many markets

    Trade top pairs with deep liquidity. New pairs listed frequently.

Rewards

    Instantly earn $DYDX after each trade

Fast onboarding

    Log in with your existing crypto wallet and start trading in minutes

Governance

    You, the trader, control the future of dYdX Chain

Low fees

    Trade in size with an attractive fee structure

Features

We have rebuilt our exchange from the ground up.

#### Mobile friendly

A responsive web interface, and native applications designed from the ground
up Get **dYdX** for iPhone

#### Fully decentralized

A native **chain** and **governance protocol** for dYdX

Dashboard Forums

Curious to explore? View block explorer here →

#### Tutorials

Learn how to trade from the pros

#### Self custody

Your funds are yours. Trade with no risk of bank runs.

#### Simple onboarding

Get started with dYdX Chain in seconds, with your existing crypto wallet.You
can use various frontends to access dYdX Learn more →

Get startedv4

#### Advanced order types

Trade like a pro with advanced order types, including price triggers.Trade
nowv4

#### Earn trading rewards

Earn rewards in $DYDX, as you trade. With $DYDX you can contribute to the
governance and future of the protocol.All rewards are made available by the
dYdX Foundation. dYdX Trading Inc. is not affiliated with the aforementioned
rewards program.

#### Fully open source

Build on top of the dYdX protocol. Get started by reading documentation, or
view the code on Github

GitHub →Documentation →Terms →

Join the team

We are a vision-led team with a long-term mission.

#### Mission

We are building towards a truly open financial system.

#### Vision

Anyone, anywhere can build on top of dYdX.

Sound interesting? Join us →
